direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve a specific attribute value (id vs. class) from the element's attributes.
The id method can be substituted by calling attr("id") to retrieve the same attribute value.
Both methods involve retrieving an attribute from the element's attributes, but attribute(String) returns an Attribute object.
Both methods access and manipulate attributes of the element, though dataset() specifically targets data attributes.
Both methods depend on the element's attributes for their functionality, though they retrieve different attributes.
